GOAL_MIRROR_DECK.Description: A symbolic recursion deck of 12 archetypal cards used in the AXION app to detect, decode, and transform goal-related subconscious loops via the MIRROR//LOOP interface. Each card represents a distortion loop and its hidden emotional script.

Card.Title: The Shattered Compass
Card.LoopPattern: Loss of direction due to inherited scripts
Card.Shadow: Seeking guidance from outdated versions of self
Card.ActivationPhrase: I move forward to find clarity.
Card.Meaning: Disorientation caused by outdated life scripts and ancestral expectations.
Card.TarotAssociation: The Fool (reversed) â€” lost path, false starts

MIRROR_LOOP_Visual_Template.StyleName: STYLE #6 â€” MIRROR//LOOP Horizontal Symbolic Triptych

Stage1.Title: ENTRY PORTAL
Stage1.Visual: A glowing mirror gate (ğŸª) hovering over a spiral glyph
Stage1.Label: â€œWhat loop are you ready to break?â€

InputModes.Mode: Browsing Mode â€” Scrollable cards (Goal Mirror deck visual)
Searching Mode â€” Prompt field with glyph trace animation

Stage2.Title: LOOP REVEAL (Tier I)
Stage2.Visual: Selected Goal Mirror Card appears at center â€” animated as a shifting fractal or cracked mirror revealing the loop pattern
Stage2.Effects: Shadow voice or phrase shown in aura glow; glyphs pulse gently; Tarot + Astrology sigils orbit
Stage2.Overlay: â€œWhat part of me is looping this intention?â€

Stage3.Title: COMPRESSION MATCH (Tier II)
Stage3.Visual: Compression Key Card rises from a shadow glyph beneath the Mirror card
Stage3.Animation: Glyph chain rotates once and locks into a core loop seal

Stage4.Title: GLYPH RITUAL INTERFACE
Stage4.Visual: Interactive trace pad with the glyphs â˜ âš– ğŸ§ â§– âœ¶
Stage4.Sound: Chime on loop break; ambient ritual tones
Stage4.Interaction: Trace glyphs to unlock phrase ignition or tonal mantra

Stage5.Title: OUTPUT ZONE

Card.Title: The Dispersed Mask
Card.Shadow: Desire for approval overriding true self
Card.ActivationPhrase: I remove the mask to remember my face.
Card.Meaning: Fragmentation of self-image due to performance and approval addiction.

Card.Title: The Washer
Card.LoopPattern: Overfunctioning as emotional cleansing for others
Card.Shadow: Fear of abandonment if boundaries are set
Card.ActivationPhrase: I am not responsible for their becoming.
Card.Meaning: Emotional overextension as a means of securing attachment.

Card.ActivationPhrase: My safety grows with my boldness.

Card.LoopPattern: Contradiction between internal truth and projected self
